details.title: Phase Noise Investigation of Multicarrier Sub-THz Wireless Transmission System Based on an Injection-Locked Gain-Switched Laser
details.abstract: In this paper, we propose a multi-carrier THz wireless communication system using an injection-locked gain-switched laser as an optical comb source. The phase noise of the 192 GHz signal resulting from the beating of two optical comb lines is theoretically analyzed and experimentally examined. Moreover, a three channel, 10 Gbaud QPSK THz signal is generated, and transmission over 40 km standard single mode fiber (SSMF) is experimentally demonstrated.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
